name: INUpdateMediaAffinityIntentResponseCode
desc: Codes returned by an intents handler in response to an update media affinity request.

items.name: case inProgress
items.desc: The app is currently trying to process the update affinity request.

items.name: case success
items.desc: The app successfully updated the user’s affinity for the media.

items.name: case failure
items.desc: The app is unable to update the user’s affinity for the media.

items.name: case failureRequiringAppLaunch
items.desc: The user needs to launch the app to update the user’s affinity for the media.
